verbs.description: [V: Appearing] [ARGM-LOC: on Tuesday ’s Megyn Kelly Today] , [ARG1: NBC reporter Stephanie Gosk] blasted her media colleagues for making far too much of a retired English teacher who “ graded ” a letter sent to her from President Trump , nitpicking the document over grammar mistakes and capitalization .
